name: Divide (itch) (Jordan-dines)
description:
GAME OVERVIEW

Divide is a Turn-Based-Strategy game set in a cyberpunk dystopia. You play as Clade and Gen who need to fight their way through the backstreets of this crumbling metropolis. Use their augmentations to overcome any foe that stands in their way of escaping The Gauntlet.

PROJECT OVERVIEW

This game was developed over 18 weeks as part of the 2nd year capstone project from students who have now graduated from AIE Melbourne in 2018.
